--- select_singer_with_select_in_from_and_as.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM (
  SELECT
    *
  FROM
    Singers
  WHERE
    SingerID = 1
) as S

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*ast.Hint)(nil),
  With:  (*ast.With)(nil),
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Select:   0,
    Distinct: false,
    As:       nil,
    Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From:   11,
      Source: &ast.SubQueryTableExpr{
        Lparen: 16,
        Rparen: 77,
        Query:  &ast.Select{
          Select:   20,
          Distinct: false,
          As:       nil,
          Results:  []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.Star{
              Star: 31,
            },
          },
          From: &ast.From{
            From:   35,
            Source: &ast.TableName{
              Table: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 44,
                NameEnd: 51,
                Name:    "Singers",
              },
              Hint:   (*ast.Hint)(nil),
              As:     (*ast.AsAlias)(nil),
              Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
            },
          },
          Where: &ast.Where{
            Where: 54,
            Expr:  &ast.BinaryExpr{
              Op:   "=",
              Left: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 64,
                NameEnd: 72,
                Name:    "SingerID",
              },
              Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
                ValuePos: 75,
                ValueEnd: 76,
                Base:     10,
                Value:    "1",
              },
            },
          },
          GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
          Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
          OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
          Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
        },
        As: &ast.AsAlias{
          As:    -1,
          Alias: &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 82,
            NameEnd: 83,
            Name:    "S",
          },
        },
        Sample: (*ast.TableSample)(nil),
      },
    },
    Where:   (*ast.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*ast.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*ast.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*ast.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*ast.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM Singers WHERE SingerID = 1) AS S
